name: LFX Tool Executor Node
description: A dedicated executor node for running Langflow tools inside the Droq distributed runtime. Exposes a lightweight FastAPI surface and hosts tool-specific logic for 200+ components including AI/ML providers, vector databases, search APIs, and productivity tools.

config.description: LFX Tool Executor Node for running Langflow components in Droq workflows

input_output.agentql.agentql_api: Extracts structured data from a web page using an AgentQL query or a Natural Language description.
input_output.input_output.chat: Get chat inputs from the Playground.

data.data.api_request: Make HTTP requests using URL or cURL commands.
data.data.csv_to_data: Load a CSV file, CSV from a file path, or a valid CSV string and convert it to a list of Data
data.data.file: Loads content from one or more files.
data.data.json_to_data: Convert a JSON file, JSON from a file path, or a JSON string to a Data object or a list of Data objects
data.data.save_file: Save data to local file, AWS S3, or Google Drive in the selected format.

models.models.language_model: Runs a language model given a specified provider.
models.models.embedding_model: Generate embeddings using a specified provider.

processing.processing.batch_run: Runs an LLM on each row of a DataFrame column. If no column is specified, all columns are used.
processing.processing.combine_text: Combine text inputs into a single output.
processing.processing.create_data: Create data objects from various inputs.

logic.logic.conditional_router: Routes an input message to a corresponding output based on text comparison.
logic.logic.loop: Iterates over a list of Data objects, outputting one item at a time and aggregating results from loop inputs.
logic.logic.run_flow: Execute sub-flows within a main flow.

major_providers.google.google_generative_ai: Generate text using Google's Gemini models.
major_providers.amazon.amazon_bedrock_model: Generate text using Amazon Bedrock LLMs with the legacy ChatBedrock API. This component is deprecated.
major_providers.azure.azure_openai: Generate text using Azure OpenAI models.

embedding_providers.amazon.amazon_bedrock_embedding: Generate embeddings using Amazon Bedrock models.
embedding_providers.azure.azure_openai_embeddings: Generate embeddings using Azure OpenAI models.
embedding_providers.google.google_generative_ai_embeddings: Generate embeddings using Google's Gemini models.

composio.composio.composio_api: Use Composio toolset to run actions with your agent

vector_databases.FAISS.faiss: FAISS Vector Store with search capabilities

search_apis.google.google_search_api_core: Call Google Search API and return results as a DataFrame.
search_apis.arxiv.arxiv: Search and retrieve papers from ArXiv
search_apis.wikipedia.wikipedia: Search and retrieve content from Wikipedia

agent_frameworks.agents.agent: Define the agent's instructions, then enter a task to complete using tools.
